text: I feel like I have not made a great deal of progress on understanding audio/video muxing today... the MediaCodec stuff doesn't make sense to me, and the example code isn't close enough to this use case.
<@U02F8TTPU> I'm testing some android stuff for glaze right now, then lets check some stuff?
are you around for a bit today?
this example uses mp4parser, but I wasn't able to get it to work without crashing yesterday: <http://www.hnwatcher.com/r/1170899/Video-recording-and-processing-in-Android>

text: I'm trying to get Ryan to send us his feedback, but no luck yet.
Maybe I'm doing something wrong in my jcodec encoding. I'll keep working on it, just feel a little bit circular today
right now I'm trying to figure out why genymotion is freezing adb
all the more reason to team up for a bit
I think I have it working!
Right now it's hard-coded at 6 seconds, but that can be improved tomorrow. I'm posting a build.
mp4parser wasn't dealing well with single-frame videos and mp4 audio, so I made it 2 frames and made audio AAC, and after some debugging, it works
